name: PioneerTrail
0:
”Alexa, open pioneer trail”
”Alexa, start pioneer trail”
”Alexa, launch pioneer trail”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pioneer trail
Developer Terms of Use
des:
It's March 1847... 
You've got just $700 left. 
You need to travel by covered wagon with your family from Independence Missouri to Oregon City before January 1st to claim your 650 acres of free land.

How will you spend your money? Lots of animals and few supplies? Fast but risky...

Just a couple oxen, but tons of supplies? Safe and slow...but will you make it before the winter blizzards?

You better buy a lot of bullets too...wild animals, bandits, and hostile tribes of native peoples not exactly thrilled by your violation their ancestral lands.

Over 65,000 pioneers died on the Oregon Trail...TRY NOT TO BE ONE OF THEM.

HOW TO PLAY:

1. Just say to your Echo, "Open Pioneer Trail."
2. Decide how much money to spend on oxen, food, ammo, warm clothing, and medical supplies.
3. Choose whether to hunt for food along the way, or buy more supplies from forts along your journey.
4. Choose whether to behave peacefully with natives peoples, or surrender to your paranoia and fears.
5. Don't end up like the Donner Party!!!!

FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT:
If you enjoyed The Pioneer Trail, please leave us a review telling us what you love, and what adventures you'd like to go on next!

Email us at support@volleythat.com if you have any issues, feedback, or suggestions. We'd love to hear from you!

LEARN MORE:
Created by Volley - the makers of the hit Alexa games: Song Quiz, Bedtime Stories, Yes Sire, Popcorn Tycoon, Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader, Family Duel, Price Tag, and Dungeon Frenzy.
